content: शंबर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [शंब्-अरच्] Best, excellent. --रः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a demon slain by Pradyumna, q v. {@--2@} A mountain. {@--3@} A kind of deer. {@--4@} A Jina. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of the trees चित्रक, लोघ्र, and अर्जुन. {@--6@} A kind of fish. {@--7@} War. --रं {@--1@} Water. {@--2@} A cloud. {@--3@} Wealth. {@--4@} A rite or religious observance
